snippet: Prices for that routine procedure, as well as other tests and services, differ radically from state to state.
abstract: Editorial expresses alarm at fact that cost of colonoscopies differs radically from state to state and even within the same metropolitan area; notes that bringing highest prices for colonoscopies and other routine procedures down to more reasonable levels will play an essential role in holding the nation's health care costs at sustainable levels.
lead_paragraph: Prices for that routine procedure, as well as other tests and services, differ radically from state to state.

headline.seo: The Weird World of Colonoscopy Costs
headline.main: The Weird World of Colonoscopy Costs
headline.print_headline: The Weird World of Colonoscopy Costs
